lines: While being taken to the park, your dad meets an old college buddy who is wheeling a baby about your age. As the two dads talk, you casually begin to eye the baby in the other carriage.
#PUT YOUR FINGER NEAR THE OTHER BABY'S FACE
#PUT YOUR FINGER NEAR THE OTHER BABY'S FACE
#PUT YOUR FINGER NEAR THE OTHER BABY'S FACE
Snob! You are able to get away with these terrible manners now, but soon you will find that one must learn how to socialize properly.
Your rigid style of behavior may interfere with your ability to make adequate social contacts in later life.
A baby! You wonder if it has all the same parts as you.
You poke the other baby right in the eye. He starts to cry. Your father is slightly embarrassed. The other dad is worried that his little baby is not macho enough to take a little poke.
#PAT THE OTHER BABY TO CALM HIM DOWN

It doesn't work. Geez! This kid is a CRYBABY. You are learning that sometimes no matter how nice you are to some people they just don't appreciate it. Your dad moves you away from the other baby and gives you a cookie to keep you
occupied. At least he appreciates your empathy.
Why waste your time being nice to an overly-sensitive baby? You could have tried a little harder to be nice to him, but it wouldn't have been worth it.

The baby touches you back. You are exploring the environment and learning about one another. This causes your Intellectual and Social spheres to increase. You seem to like one another. You've made your first friend!
You want to test what this baby is made of, so you hit it in the face.
The baby starts to cry. You have no sympathy for it.

The baby is screaming from fright and you are enjoying all of the commotion you have caused. The two dads are too busy reminiscing to break up the fracas. Your aggression traits have increased. You will one day learn that all people
You've caused enough trouble for one day. How do you feel now that you know you've disrupted this poor baby's entire afternoon?
That's a good sign. We'll see if this prevents you from doing something this impulsive in the future.
You are too young to understand the definition of a bully -- but that's what you are becoming. Perhaps if your dad paid more attention to you, your behavior wouldn't be so inappropriate.
BAM! You get bopped on the head with the other baby's bottle. The surprise of retaliation keeps you under control for the rest of the interaction. I hope you have learned your lesson.
